response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. Considering the significant value this product holds for you, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its true worth and your perceived value, while also ensuring a reasonable profit for us. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 12000}
